root.name: Pocket Bomberman
root.description: Overview First released on the original Game Boy and later ported to the Game Boy Color, Pocket Bomberman was the first and only Bomberman game to take our beloved hero into a 2D side-scrolling adventure. In this single player only game, the main goal was similar to the older games, kill all the enemies to advance to the next level. There are five worlds and 25 levels overall in the game and each world had a boss. Besides the main game, there is also a mini game called "Jump Game" were you are constantly jumping and must reach the top of the screen. There were three difficulties for "Jump Game," Easy, Normal, and Hard.
